name: LGX Detail Query
author: Murat
description: LGX transaction log için SQL sorgusu oluşturur

handlerJson.name: LGX Detail Query
handlerJson.title: LGX Detail Query Clipboard
handlerJson.output_format: SELECT * FROM LGX.SMG_TRANSACTION_LOGEXT stl WHERE stl.TRANSACTIONLOGOID =$(oid) AND stl.TRXID = $(trxid) AND stl.PROCESSDATE = $(processdate)
